explains: n. 早产的动物；鬼鬼祟祟的人

sentences.en: John was trying to slink into the house by the back door.
sentences.cn: 约翰想从后门溜进房子里。

sentences.en: He decided that he couldn't just slink away, so he went and sat next to his wife.
sentences.cn: 他决定不能偷偷溜走，于是便走到妻子身边坐下了。

sentences.en: He wavered, and started to slink away, but Tom seized him and said, "Aunt Polly, it ain't fair."
sentences.cn: 他犹豫了一下，打算溜走，可是汤姆一把抓住他，说道：“波莉姨妈，这不公平。”
